text: Another Nurse (N4) added: "the gloves that we get are not enough as well and we do not have aprons to cover ourselves. We put ourselves in a great danger of contracting infection, sometimes I get scared if I will not infect my family because the same clothes that I use at work is the ones that I go with at home and my children will come running when I am back from work I am scared to give them a hug because I do not know if my clothes are contaminated."
